maqras.text: But the successors who succeeded after them wasted their worship (salat) and followed lusty desires, so they will meet (the punishment for their) error
except him who repents and believes and does righteous work, so those will enter the garden and they will not be dealt with unjustly in anything
gardens of everlasting bliss which the Beneficent (God) has promised to His servants in the unseen, His promise will certainly come to pass
Therein they will not hear (any) vain talk but peace, and therein there will be their provision for them morning and evening
That is the garden which We will make (those of) Our servants to inherit who had guarded (against evil)
And we do not come down but by the command of your Lord, to Him belongs whatever is before us and whatever is behind us and whatever is between that, and your Lord is not forgetful

Lord of the skies and the earth and that which is between these two. So serve Him and be constant in His service. Do you know (anyone else having the same) name (or attributes, which) belong to Him? (R)
And man says, "What ! when I am dead, will I surely be brought out alive
Does not man remember that We created him before, when he was nothing
So by your Lord, We will definitely gather them and the devils, then We will definitely make them to be present around hell on their knees
Then We will definitely pull out from every sect those of them who were most severe in their revolt against the Beneficent (God)
Then surely We know best about those who are most worthy to enter therein
And there is not one of you but will pass over it, this is an inevitable decision of your Lord
Then We will deliver those who had guarded (against evil) and We will leave in it those who were unjust, on their knees
And when Our clear signs are read to them, those who do not believe say to those who believe, "Which of the two parties (yours or ours) is better in position and better in assembly
And how many of the generations have We destroyed before them, who were better in riches and in appearance (show)

Say, "For one who is in error, the Beneficent (God) allows (the rope of leniency) to stretch for him (with a set) stretching, until when they see that which they were promised, either the punishment or the hour of doom, then they will know who is in an evil position and weaker in forces

And God increases the guidance of those who receive guidance, and the (permanent) righteous works which remain, are better in the sight of your Lord, in respect of reward and better in respect of returns
Then have you seen him who does not believe in Our signs and says, "I will definitely be given wealth and children
Is the unseen disclosed to him or has he made an agreement with the Beneficent (God)
By no means, We will write down what he says and We will prolong for him (the period) of punishment (with a set) prolonging
And We will inherit from him what he says and he will come to Us alone
And they have taken gods besides God that they may be (a source of) might for them
By no means, they (the false gods) will reject their having worshipped them and they will become their opponents
Did you not consider that We send the devils on the disbelievers to incite them with an incitement
So do not make haste against them, We only number for them, a number (of days)
The day We will gather those who guard (against evil, like honourable) guests before the Beneficent (God)
and We will drive the criminals to hell (like) thirsty (cattle)
none will have the power to mediate except him who has received an agreement, (permission) from the Beneficent (God)
And they say, "The Beneficent (God) has taken (to Him self) a son
You have indeed come with a disastrous thing
The skies are about to cleave asunder due to it and the earth to split asunder and the mountains to fall down in pieces
that they invoke a son for the Beneficent (God)
And it does not suit the Beneficent (God) that He should take (to Himself) a son
there is no one in the skies and the earth but he comes to the Beneficent (God) as a servant
He has computed them and numbered them a numbering
and everyone of them will come to Him on the day of resurrection, alone
Those who believe and do righteous works, the Beneficent (God) will certainly assign love for them
So We have made the (Quran) easy in your language only because you should (be able to) convey the good news through it to those who guard (against evil) and warn through it, quarrelsome people
And how many generations have We destroyed before them, do you find anyone of them or hear (even) their whisper? (R 6, P 15 Â½)
